Multiple media outlets: including CNN News18 and CNBC Awaz, initially tweeted a video claiming that the US army was playing the Indian national anthem in preparation for PM Modi's arrival at the Howdy Modi event in Texas.
Both News18 and CNBC Awaz have since tak: but the video continues to be viral on Facebook and Twitter.
The video is also accompanied by various: suggesting that it is being shared in the context of his visit to the US.
However: it was later revealed that the video actually shows the US Army band playing the Indian National Anthem during the concluding day of the Yudh Abhyas joint military training exercise between the Indian and US Army in Washington. This information was tweeted by Manish Prasad, an India TV journalist, and also shared by ANI.
